scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./dist/server.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && nodemon --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/server.ts
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && tscpaths -p tsconfig.json -s ./src -o ./dist && cp -r ./src/public/. ./dist/public && cp -r ./types/. ./dist/types
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:client
